TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookie extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供创建和操作各 HTTP Cookie 的类型安全方法。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to create and manipulate individual HTTP cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类获取和设置的各个 cookie 的属性。The class gets and sets properties of individual cookies. 类提供了方法存储、 检索和管理多个 cookie。The class provides methods to store, retrieve, and manage multiple cookies. ASP.NET 包括两个内部 cookie 集合。ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 通过访问的集合集合对象包含传输到中的服务器客户端的 cookie`Cookie`标头。The collection accessed through the collection of the object contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 通过访问的集合集合对象包含新 cookie 在服务器上创建和传输到客户端在`Set-Cookie`HTTP 响应标头。The collection accessed through the collection of the object contains new cookies created on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` HTTP response header. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查名为一个 cookie`DateCookieExample`中对象。The following code example demonstrates how to check for a cookie named `DateCookieExample` in the object. 如果未找到该 cookie，它被创建并添加到对象。If the cookie is not found, it is created and added to the object. Cookie 设置在 10 分钟后过期。The cookie is set to expire in 10 minutes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookie/cs/HttpCookie.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookie/vb/HttpCookie.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Domain { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将此 Cookie 与其关联的域。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain to associate the cookie with.

value.span: 要将此 Cookie 与其关联的域名。

span.span: The name of the domain to associate the cookie with.
The default value is the current domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置`Domain`属性限制传输到从该域中请求资源的客户端的 cookie。Setting the `Domain` attribute limits transmission of the cookie to clients requesting a resource from that domain. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 cookie 的域。The following code example sets the cookie's domain. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置此 Cookie 的过期日期和时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the expiration date and time for the cookie.

value.span: 此 Cookie 的过期时间（在客户端）。

span.span: The time of day (on the client) at which the cookie expires.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例在从当前时间中设置为 10 分钟的 cookie 的过期时间。The following code example sets the expiration time of the cookie to 10 minutes from the current time. span.span: if the cookie has subkeys, otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查多个值的 cookie 集合的每个成员。The following code example examines each member of a cookie collection for multiple values. 如果一个 cookie属性是`true`，存在多个值，此示例将的值名称复制到一个字符串数组，到另一个字符串数组的相应值，该值指示。If a cookie's property is `true`, indicating that multiple values are present, this example copies the value names into one string array and the corresponding values into another string array. 有关如何创建 cookie 的多个值的示例，请参阅。For an example of how to create multiple values for a cookie, see . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 Cookie 是否可通过客户端脚本访问。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a cookie is accessible by client-side script.

value.span: 如果 Cookie 具有 特性且不能通过客户端脚本访问，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cookie has the attribute and cannot be accessed through a client-side script; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 6 Service Pack 1 和更高版本支持的 cookie 属性中， ，可帮助缓解导致被盗的 cookie 的跨站点脚本威胁。Microsoft Internet Explorer version 6 Service Pack 1 and later supports a cookie property, , that can help mitigate cross-site scripting threats that result in stolen cookies. 被盗的 cookie 可能包含敏感信息标识用户访问该站点，例如 ASP.NET 会话 ID 或窗体身份验证票证，并可以由攻击者伪装成用户或获取敏感信息以便重播。Stolen cookies can contain sensitive information identifying the user to the site, such as the ASP.NET session ID or forms authentication ticket, and can be replayed by the attacker in order to masquerade as the user or obtain sensitive information. 当`HttpOnly`cookie 收到符合浏览器，它都无法访问客户端脚本。When an `HttpOnly` cookie is received by a compliant browser, it is inaccessible to client-side script. > [!CAUTION] > 设置属性`true`不会阻止具有访问权限的攻击者到网络通道直接访问该 cookie。Setting the property to `true` does not prevent an attacker with access to the network channel from accessing the cookie directly. 请考虑使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 来帮助防止发生这样的。Consider using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to help protect against this. 工作站安全也是很重要，因为恶意用户无法使用打开的浏览器窗口或计算机包含永久 cookie 来获取对 Web 站点合法用户的标识与访问权限。Workstation security is also important, as a malicious user could use an open browser window or a computer containing persistent cookies to obtain access to a Web site with a legitimate user's identity. 此属性可以帮助缓解的方式和可能的攻击的详细信息，请参阅[缓解跨站点脚本使用仅 HTTP Cookie](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=41580)。For more information on possible attacks and how this property can help mitigate them, see [Mitigating Cross-site Scripting With HTTP-only Cookies](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=41580). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写`HttpOnly`cookie，并演示如何不通过 ECMAScript 由客户端访问。The following code example demonstrates how to write an `HttpOnly` cookie and shows how it is not accessible by the client through ECMAScript. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpOnlyCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpOnlyCookie/CS/httponlycookiecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpOnlyCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpOnlyCookie/vb/httponlycookievb.aspx#1)]

The cookie value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例中的客户端从接收 cookie 集合`Cookie`标头，并循环访问查找具有特定名称的 cookie 的集合。The following code example receives a cookie collection from the client in the `Cookie` header and loops through the collection looking for a cookie with the specific name. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要与当前 Cookie 一起传输的虚拟路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual path to transmit with the current cookie.

value.span: 要与此 Cookie 一起传输的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to transmit with the cookie.

value.span: 默认为 ，也就是服务器根目录。

span.span: The default is , which is the server root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展属性来完整地描述特定 cookie 应用到的 URL。The property extends the property to completely describe the specific URL to which the cookie applies. 例如，在 URL http:/ www.microsoft.com/asp，域为 www.microsoft.com，路径是 /asp。For example, in the URL http:/www.microsoft.com/asp, the domain is www.microsoft.com and the path is /asp. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的一个新的 cookie 的属性。The following code example sets the property of a new cookie. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Path Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Path Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Path Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Path Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::SameSiteMode SameSite { System::Web::SameSiteMode get(); void set(System::Web::SameSiteMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 cookie 的 SameSite 属性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value for the SameSite attribute of the cookie.

value.span: 一个枚举值，它表示 cookie 的强制模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that represents the enforcement mode of the cookie.

value.span: 如果应用程序面向 .NET Framework 4.7.2 或更高版本，则默认值为 ；否则默认值为 。

span.span: If the application targets the .NET Framework 4.7.2 or later versions, the default value is ; otherwise, the default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Secure { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用安全套接字层 (SSL)（即仅通过 HTTPS）传输 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to transmit the cookie using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)--that is, over HTTPS only.

value.span: 如果通过 SSL 连接 (HTTPS) 传输 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to transmit the cookie over an SSL connection (HTTPS); otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置的 cookie 对整个应用程序使用 SSL 传输，请在应用程序的配置文件中，Web.config 文件中，驻留在应用程序的根目录下启用它。To set the transmission of cookies using SSL for an entire application, enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[httpCookies 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74790718-bfa3-4935-bc9a-59c88797e08f)。For more information, see [httpCookies Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74790718-bfa3-4935-bc9a-59c88797e08f). 以编程方式使用的值设置属性重写在 Web.config 文件中设置的值。Values set programmatically using the property override values set in the Web.config file. 在处理敏感信息，强烈建议你使用 SSL 加密使用 HTTPS 协议。When dealing with sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you use HTTPS protocol with SSL encryption. SSL 保护防止数据被更改 （数据完整性）、 保护用户的标识 （保密性），并且可确保数据来源于预期的客户端 （身份验证）。SSL protects against data being altered (data integrity), protects a user's identity (confidentiality), and assures that data originates from the expected client (authentication). 有关加密的优势的详细信息，请参阅[加密服务](~/docs/standard/security/cryptographic-services.md)。For more information on the benefits of encryption, see [Cryptographic Services](~/docs/standard/security/cryptographic-services.md). 有关在 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) Web 服务器上配置 SSL 的详细信息，请参阅[在 Web 服务器或 Web 站点上配置 SSL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=38553)。For more information about configuring SSL on an Internet Information Services (IIS) Web server, see [Configuring SSL on a Web Server or a Web Site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=38553). ## Examples 下面的代码示例中，如果 cookie 设置传输使用 SSL 会采取措施。The following code example takes action if the cookie is set to transmit using SSL. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Shareable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 确定 cookie 是否允许参与输出缓存。

span.span: Determines whether the cookie is allowed to participate in output caching.

value.span: 指定的 输出缓存不会给出包含一个或多个对外 cookie 的 取消；否则 。

span.span: to specify that output caching will not be suppressed for a give containing one or more outbound cookies; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果给定包含与一个或多个出站 cookie设置为`false`（默认值），输出将抑制响应的缓存。If a given contains one or more outbound cookies with is set to `false` (the default value), output caching will be suppressed for the response. 这样可以防止包含防止潜在的敏感信息在响应中缓存和发送到多个客户端的 cookie。This prevents cookies that contain potentially sensitive information from being cached in the response and sent to multiple clients. 若要允许包含 cookie 缓存的响应，将缓存配置通常响应，例如使用`OutputCache`指令或 MVC [OutputCache] 特性，并将设置所有出站的 cookie 具有设置为`true`。To allow a response containing cookies to be cached, configure caching normally for the response, such as using the `OutputCache` directive or MVC's [OutputCache] attribute, and set all outbound cookies to have set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryParse (string input, out System.Web.HttpCookie result);

returns.span: 如果 成功转换，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新的 cookie，并向其添加几个值。The following code example creates a new cookie and adds several values to it. 有关如何从一个 cookie 中提取多个值的示例，请参阅。For an example of how to extract multiple values from one cookie, see . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Values Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Values Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Values Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Values Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
